name: Blues
description: Blues, also known as “Livers,” is a famous hybrid strain in the U.K. Its origins are a well-kept secret, but many speculate Blues to be a unique phenotype of Sensi Seeds’ Skunk #1 from the 80’s. Those who have chanced upon this mysterious clone-only strain describe its effects as uplifting, long-lasting, and clear-headed. Blues plants are strong and resilient, growing large buds that give off a sweet berry aroma.
attributes_title: Happy, Relaxed, Sleepy, Talkative, Hungry, Stress, Pain, Depression, Lack of Appetite, Insomnia, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Paranoid, Dizzy, Headache
